title: How to Keep Oatmeal or Porridge Warm

steps.headline: Pour the cooked oatmeal or porridge into a jug.
Pour hot water into a bowl or saucepan.
steps.description: Stand the jug in the bowl or saucepan of hot water.

steps.headline: Cover the jug mouth with a clean cloth or jug cover if wished.
Allow break-fasters to pour direct into their bowls and add milk, brown sugar, maple syrup, grated nutmeg, fruit pieces etc., as desired.
